name: Volt Amp Helmet
description: A helmet designed to match the Volt Amp Skin, designed by Faven_PS.

languages.name: Volt-Helm: Amp

languages.description: Un Casque conçu pour correspondre à l'Aspect Volt Amp, conçu par Faven_PS.

languages.description: Un elmo concepito per combinarsi con la Skin Amp di Volt, ideato da Faven_PS.

languages.description: Faven_PS에 의해 디자인된 볼트 앰프 스킨과 세트 구성의 헬멧입니다.
